org.deeplearning4j.eval

Class RegressionEvaluation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.eval.BaseEvaluation<RegressionEvaluation>
      • org.deeplearning4j.eval.RegressionEvaluation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IEvaluation<RegressionEvaluation>

    public class RegressionEvaluation
extends BaseEvaluation<RegressionEvaluation>
    Evaluation method for the evaluation of regression algorithms.
    Provides the following metrics, for each column:
    - MSE: mean squared error
    - MAE: mean absolute error
    - RMSE: root mean squared error
    - RSE: relative squared error
    - PC: pearson correlation coefficient
    - R^2: coefficient of determination See for example: http://www.saedsayad.com/model_evaluation_r.htm For classification, see Evaluation
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
